title: Cannot Transfer Account to Oceania
body:
I've had this particular account since before Oceania was a thing and when the free transfer came along I had too many friends on NA to want to transfer. But now everyone that I know have stopped playing, and I've tentatively started playing again and I've been looking at getting my actual account over to Oceania as there's too much lag on NA for me to be able to play. Unfortunately it seems like I can't find the account transfer in the store.

What do?

replies.body:
You can find account transfers under the **Account** section of the store. Below is a screenshot to assist you in getting there.

http://imgur.com/a/DJ2tF

Let me know if you have any questions.
